frontmatter.title: Retailer page
frontmatter.tags: Desktop layout, Mobile layout, Iconography, Illustration, Photoshop

pageProps.content: Working at Syndy, a company with a unique solution to distribute and optimise product content, I had the chance to recreate their retailer page on the corporate website in collaboration with the marketing lead, Algirdas Desceras. My role was to transform the copy into a nice looking, eye-catching page. The colour choices are based on the guides created for Syndyâ€™s platform. As a result, we ended up with a clean and simple page that explains all the benefits the company has for retailers.
